programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Mexican Makeover / Uptown Funk - Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Chang's route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Midden Fleasure / Tread or Alive - Fendrich and his gang learn of Cluster's junkyard treasure, but Harl Cluster, Shirley and Tread unite to protect it. // Snake and Daisy take advantage of Tread's competitive nature to get him to unknowingly act as their getaway driver for a heist.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Unhappy Campers / Leprechauns 2 - Never having made it to dark, the Middlemost Post decide their latest camping trip will finally be the one. // Bud and Buddy return to the mountain, claiming they're reformed leprechauns no longer seeking Parker's gold.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep421
programme.desc: The Littlest Robot - Simon invents a robot with emotions and an ability to learn which backfires when he's exposed to the internet.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep422
programme.desc: You Troll - The chipmunks try to keep Dave from getting on the internet after a performance he posts gets negative comments.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep422
programme.desc: Life of the Party - The Chipmunks along with Kevin and Cheesy decide to crash BoCarter's birthday yacht party after not being invited.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Sick as a Chipmunk - After caring for a sick Brittany, Eleanor and Jeanette wonder if Brittany would care for them if they were sick.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun!

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep226
programme.desc: We Did A Bad Thing - When their secret identities gets out, Danger Force will stop at nothing to prevent their parents from finding out who is behind their masks.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Friends and Family - The Terrans' erratic behavior may be reflecting Mo and Robby's anxiety about their first day at their new school. Or it could be something far worse...

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep107
programme.desc: First Con-tact - When a mentor from Dal's past persuades him to use their Federation cover for personal gain, they quickly discover Starfleet has protocols for a reason.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Cover Girls / Save the Date - When all 10 of Lincoln’s sisters ask him to cover for them on the same day, Lincoln has his hands full. // Bobby and Lori go on a double date with Lincoln and Bobby’s little sister, Ronnie Anne.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Time Disruptors - A local legend comes to life as Nate and friends prepare for an epic Halloween. But Nate's awesome plans may be foiled as a mysterious presence stalks the students and Francis disappears for hours at a time over at Jefferson.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep122
programme.desc: Chum Bucket Supreme / Single Cell Anniversary - Plankton hires Patrick to create advertising slogans for the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob helps Plankton find the perfect anniversary gift for Karen.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep103
programme.desc: Spongicus / Suctioncup Symphony - Plankton has demolished the Chum Bucket! In its place, he has built a Roman coliseum. // The Bikini Bottom Symphony is accepting submissions for their composition contest, and Squidward is determined to win.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Dog's Best Friend / Out of Shape - Angus tries to woo the only dog on the mountain that doesn't like him: Jelly. // Parker becomes overly obsessed with a game to the point where the little nimbus isn't a cloud anymore.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep511
programme.desc: School of Shock / Elecshunned - Lisa takes over her first-grade classroom and learns that there's more to teaching than just knowing facts. // Leni goes toe-to-toe with the Mayor in a city-wide Royal Woods election.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Hurl, Interrupted / Diamonds are for Never - Lynn tries to stall her friends from riding the new coaster at Dairyland before they find out her big secret. // After Lola and Mr. Grouse find a precious gem, the two struggle to decide who gets to watch over it.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Two of Clubs / Vacation Daze - Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together. // When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Snack Pact / The Horror-Scope - The family discovers an amazing tamale cart and tries to keep it a secret from Abuela. // Ronnie Anne doesn't believe in an astrological prediction that 'love will find her,' until it seems to come true.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Parker Gets Rich / Ultimate Fighting Cloud - After winning a raffle, Parker comes into a large sum of money, which Angus warns will come at a cost. // The Middlemost Post discover a secret backyard wrestling league that challenges both their skills and egos.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Parker Gets the Bird / Anchor Shackleton - Parker tends to a small strawberry garden until its survival is threatened by a horde of ravenous birds. // Parker discovers Angus can't swim, but with the little nimbus' help, the sailor's on his way to becoming a buoy.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep120
programme.desc: No Hat for Pat / Toy Store Of Doom - Patrick is sick of all of his friends not being able to play with him because they have to put on their Krusty Krab hats and go to work. // A new toy store has opened up in Bikini Bottom, and SpongeBob and Patrick couldn't be happier!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep175
programme.desc: It's a SpongeBob Christmas! - SpongeBob inadvertently helps Plankton enact his plot to put all of Bikini Bottom on Santa’s “naughty” list, and now has to stop Plankton before he gets his Christmas wish—the Krabby Patty secret formula!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep122
programme.desc: Chum Bucket Supreme / Single Cell Anniversary - Plankton hires Patrick to create advertising slogans for the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob helps Plankton find the perfect anniversary gift for Karen.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep125
programme.desc: Pineapple Fever / Chum Caverns - Squidward gets stuck indoors with SpongeBob and Patrick during a storm. // Plankton creates an underground restaurant that threatens to put the Krusty Krab out of business.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Mama Told Me Not to Kung Fu - Crane's mom visits the Valley of Peace. Crane reveals to Po that his mom hates Kung Fu so he promised her that he would never have anything to do with it. Crane asks Po and the others to help him keep his secret from his mom.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Huge - Self-conscious about his size, Mantis ingests a growth potion that makes him huge. Mantis is initially thrilled with the results, but soon his large size puts the entire village and his friends in grave danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Zuko Alone - Traveling without Uncle now, Zuko wanders alone into an Earth Kingdom town where he bonds with a local boy. Meanwhile, Zuko is haunted by memories of his own youth.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep219
programme.desc: When the Chips are Down - While Mort and Private stop to liberate Cheezy Bitz from the zoo vending machine they are both sucked in.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep231
programme.desc: Arch-Enemy / The Big S.T.A.N.K. - Private has an arch enemy in the form of Dale the snail. Why does this snail hate Private so much? // King Julien becomes enamored of a toilet the penguins have built. He wants to use it as his new throne, only the toilet is actually a stink bomb.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep232
programme.desc: The Most Dangerous Game Night / Street Smarts - Marlene plans a game night to help the zoo animals bond but it takes a terrible turn when the snacks run out. // Elmer the dog wants a friend, and thinks he found one in Mort.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Employee of the Month / Brocrastination - Buhdeuce's life is about to change forever when SwaySway gives out an award. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce have to take care of a pile of dirty dishes, before IT takes care of THEM!

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep105

programme.desc: Busy Buddies/Johann Mouse/Much Ado About Mousing/That's My Pup/Snowbody Loves Me/Missing Mouse/Cruise Cat/The Invisible Mouse - Tom and Jerry try to protect a precocious baby when he wanders around the house.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep21/Ep41/Ep89/Ep73/Ep103
programme.desc: Film Fest/Space Mission: Danger/Castles And Kitties/Time Capsule/The Birthday To End All Birthdays: Part 1 - It's opening night at the Unikingdom Film Festival!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep122/Ep164/Ep206/Ep139/Ep180
programme.desc: CheEp.Thrills/The Trouble With Bubbles/Salamander/People Pleaser/Midnight At the Mayor's Mansion - After finding a baby monster in the park, Bubbles insists on adopting it without considering the consequences!

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep8/Ep21
programme.desc: The Alliance/The Ultimate Weapon - As Fourarms, Ben is working to thwart an armored truck robbery by a tough and heavily armed female gang leader named Joey.

programme.title: Chowder Ep1A/Ep32B/Ep11B/Ep42B
programme.desc: The Thrice Cream Man/The Brain Freeze/The Moldy Touch/The Belgian Waffle Slobber-Barker - When Chowder's love of thrice cream constantly disrupts work, Mung cooks up a way to break his sweet obsession.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep33/Ep52
programme.desc: Go Goo Go/Make-Believe It Or Not - Goo believes Mac is her boyfriend...

programme.title: Chowder Ep8B/Ep29B/Ep18B/Ep49A
programme.desc: A Taste of Marzipan/The Trouble With Truffles/The Meach Harvest/Gazpacho - When Mung and Ms. Endive unveil the same dish at Marzipan City's biggest food fair, it's an all out war to decide whose is better.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep3/Ep16
programme.desc: The Krakken/Framed - While stopped at a lakefront campsite, Ben has a chance encounter with a Loch Ness-type sea monster called a Krakken.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep16/Ep57/Ep85/Ep62/Ep102
programme.desc: No Day Like Snow Day/Beep/Too Cool/Safety First/The Unikingdom Awards - When a blizzard hits the town, Master Frown tries to ruin everyone's fun by pretending to be a magical snowman!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep117/Ep159/Ep201/Ep124/Ep165
programme.desc: Puffdora's Box/Musclecup/Small World: Maze Daze - Part 3/Once Upon a Townsville/Take Your Kids to Dooms Day - When Blossom gets overzealous with spring cleaning, she accidentally unleashes a group of evil spirits.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings Ep100/Ep108/Ep109/Ep110/Ep111/Ep112/Ep113
programme.desc: Bear Pillow/Warning: Unlimited Lemmings/Bouncing Bear/Masked Racoon/Spinning Lemmings/Game Madness/Household Avatar - Grizzy wants to nap but can't find a good enough pillow.

programme.title: Taffy Ep5/Ep17/Ep26/Ep36/Ep43/Ep58/Ep74
programme.desc: I Now Pronounce You Dog And Cat/Smell Of The Chase/The White Gloves/School's Fools/Time out of Taffy/Scare Tactics/A Mouse in The House - The pets team up to recreate Mrs M's wedding video.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep2/Ep12/Ep25/Ep41/Ep52
programme.desc: Merry Qweensmas/Silence Day/Fighting Back/Achoo!/The Unforgettable Trip - Part 2 - Today, Wonderland is celebrating “Qweensmas!” Well, more precisely, the Queen is the only one celebrating because, all the residents have to give her their stuff!

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep202/Ep214/Ep231/Ep242/Ep244
programme.desc: Baby Hugo/Not Kitten Around/Flying High/Dumpling’S Birthday/Knight Rider - Hugo doesn’t want to be a big kid anymore - there are too many responsibilities. So he decides he’s going to be a baby forever.

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep17/Ep43
programme.desc: Saga of the Swamp Beast/Omelettes are Forever - The gang's trip to the bayou is ruined by a shambling Swamp Beast that's scaring away anyone who dares to enter it's soggy domain!

programme.title: Bunnicula Ep31/Ep32/Ep71/Ep72
programme.desc: Collar Me Crazy/Calendar Boys/Prism Prison/Lafitte's Lucky Locket - The pets are thrilled when a silver collar turns Bunnicula into a kind-hearted, totally normal rabbit. That is, until a new threat arrives to terrorise the now-defenceless Orlock!

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep18/Ep44
programme.desc: Dmv/The Grand Old Duck Of York - Daffy is forced to take a test to get his drivers license after hed discovered driving without one.

programme.desc: A Show Of Socks/A Dragon Tale/Rain Music/Happy Snow Year!/Music Makers/Jungle Jam/Champions Of The Day/A Foggy Fable - The Brave Bunnies visit the Mountains, where they get to know Lara the LLAMA. Lara offers them some of the socks she has knitted, but they don't fit.

programme.title: A Girl's Guide To Hunting, Fishing And Wild Cooking Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Analiese faces her biggest challenge yet, slaughtering the pigs she's reared for meat. Friends from the mainland, including Adam Liaw, Jo Barrett and Alanna Sapwell who reaffirm her commitment to her new life.

programme.title: People's Republic Of Mallacoota Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - 18 months after bushfires ravaged Mallacoota, its fractious citizens vote on the plan that will determine the town's future. But after all the disagreements, who will put up their hand to turn the plan into action? (Final)

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces Ep5
programme.desc: In 2010 the almost treeless Nullarbor plain was in terrible drought. Pastoralists were coping with the dry in different ways and some are gearing up for even tougher conditions in the future.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep11
programme.desc: Gemma Veness brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep247
programme.desc: Gemma Veness brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep247
programme.desc: Casey Briggs presents a complete round-up of the day's top stories, the latest news and the issues that matter. ABC Evening News brings together the best reporting from across the nation and speaks with expert guests.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep247
programme.desc: Australians turn to ABC News when news breaks at home or abroad. Casey Briggs presents the day's top stories, latest news and information, exclusive investigations and reports from respected journalists across the nation.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep202
programme.desc: Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Presented by Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep252
programme.desc: Casey Briggs brings you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and global news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep6
programme.desc: Continuing the story of Scott Austic who was acquitted of the murder of Stacey Thorne after shocking revelations of planted evidence. Now, Stacey's family is demanding police reopen the investigation to find her killer.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep252
programme.desc: Australia's most trusted source of independent news, ABC News connects Australians with the latest news, original reporting, reliable information and analysis to keep you informed and up-to-date. Presented by Matt Wordsworth.

programme.title: Displaced
programme.desc: In an ABC News Special, Sarah Dingle looks at the refugee crisis around the world. Nearly 90 million people are fleeing from genocide, persecution, environmental disasters and famine. Conflicts are driving this displacement.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep252
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with full coverage of today's top stories and the latest news. Matt Wordsworth brings you a complete snapshot of what's going on across the cities and suburbs, regions and rural Australia.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep3
programme.desc: The brutal cost of our green energy future. In the Democratic Republic of Congo we expose the shocking truth about the mining of cobalt, a metal essential to making the batteries in electric cars, laptops and mobile phones.

programme.title: The Sweet Life Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Elise is joined by Nick Makrides who has decided to create a unique dessert for the show drawing inspiration from his Greek heritage, some delicious nutella-stuffed cupcakes topped with Loukoumades (Greek donuts).

programme.title: 7.30 Ep202
programme.desc: Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Presented by Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep252
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with the best coverage of today's top stories and the latest news. Tyne Logan brings you a complete snapshot of what's happening in the cities and suburbs, regions and rural Australia.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night : Cannonier vs Strickland
programme.desc: Main Event - Top 10 middleweights collide on December 18, as Jared Cannonier faces off with Sean Strickland in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the Amway Center in Orlando, Florida. One of the hardest punchers in the sport, pound-for-pound, Cannonier is well aware that a big win this fall will put him back in the title conversation at 185 pounds, but he will have to dig deep to get it against a fellow elite striker in Strickland, who has won six of his last seven matchups.
